languages.text: {n}Похоже, ваш двойник и впрямь всерьез обеспокоен. Он нервно сжимает в кулаке причудливый талисман... Такой же, как подарила вам Ирлиэт на прощание в лесах Кетца Темера.{/n}

{n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Похоже, ваш двойник и впрямь всерьез обеспокоен. Он нервно сжимает в кулаке причудливый талисман... Такой же, как подарила вам Ирлиэт на прощание в лесах Кетца Темера.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger really does look seriously concerned. {mf|He|She} clutches a quaint talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It's identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger really does look seriously concerned. {mf|He|She} clutches a quaint talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It's identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelgänger looks very seriously concerned. {mf|He|She} clutches a quaint talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It's identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelgänger looks very seriously concerned. {mf|He|She} clutches a quaint talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It's identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

traits.locale_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Tu doppelgänger parece muy incómod{mf|o|a}. Sujeta con fuerza un curioso talismán en el puño... Es igual al regalo de despedida que Yrliet te dio en los bosques de Quetza Temer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu doppelgänger parece muy preocupad{mf|o|a}. Sujeta con fuerza un talismán en el puño... Es igual al regalo de despedida que Yrliet te dio en los bosques de Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Votre double semble particulièrement mal à l'aise. {mf|Il|Elle} serre nerveusement dans son poing un talisman étrange... Il est identique au cadeau d'adieu qu'Yrliet vous a offert dans les forêts de Quetza Temer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre double affiche un air préoccupé tout en serrant un étrange talisman dans son poing... Il est identique au cadeau d'adieu qu'Yrliet vous a offert dans les forêts de Quetza Temer.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーはかなり狼狽しているようだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は手に心配そうに不思議なタリスマンを握っている…ケツァ・テメルの森でユリエットが餞別にくれたものと同じものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのドッペルゲンガーはかなり狼狽しているようだ。{mf|彼|彼女}は手に心配そうに不思議なタリスマンを握っている…ケツァ・テメルの森でユリエットが餞別にくれたものと同じものだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}你的复制人看起来相当困窘，{mf|他|她}的手中紧紧攥着一枚充满异形风情的护身符……和伊莉耶特在格扎尔特默的森林中送给你的临别赠礼一模一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的复制人看起来非常紧张，{mf|他|她}的手中紧紧地攥着一件充满异形风情的护身符……和伊莉耶特在格扎尔特默的森林中送给你的临别赠礼一模一样。{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Dein Doppelgänger wirkt sehr verunsichert. {mf|Er|Sie} umklammert mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Faust nervös einen merkwürdigen Talisman ... Er ist identisch mit dem Abschiedsgeschenk, den Yrliet dir in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer gegeben hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Dein Doppelgänger|Deine Doppelgängerin} sieht ernstlich besorgt aus. {mf|Er|Sie} umklammert mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Faust nervös einen altmodischen Talisman ... Er ist identisch mit dem Abschiedsgeschenk, den Yrliet dir in den Wäldern von Quetza Temer gegeben hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: RTHopeFemale

languages.text: {n}Suretçalan, rahatsız olmuş gibi gözüküyor. Avcunda tuttuğu tuhaf şekilli nazarlığı gergince sıkıyor... Yrliet'in sana Quetza Temer ormanlarında verdiği veda hediyesinin aynısı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your doppelganger appears to be quite discomfited. {mf|He|She} clutches a strange talisman nervously in {mf|his|her} fist... It is identical to the farewell gift Yrliet gave you in the forests of Quetza Temer.{/n}
